body:
I've actually got a PR I'm about to put up that cuts the recipe listing/history load times by 40-60%. Turns out `dispatch`ing a bunch of Redux actions is worse than just handling them all in one go.

Thanks for #1014 @mythmon, I'm sure that work combined with my front end fixes will cut the load times down a ton.

body_html:
I've actually got a PR I'm about to put up that cuts the recipe listing/history load times by 40-60%. Turns out dispatching a bunch of Redux actions is worse than just handling them all in one go.

Thanks for #1014 @mythmon, I'm sure that work combined with my front end fixes will cut the load times down a ton.
